u, understanding:
Strategy: Summarise in your own words.
    Keywords: "own words", "summarise", "points".
    Marks: 1 per point.
a, analysis:
Strategy : Quote, technique, connotations, effects.
    Keywords: "close reference", "show", "language".
    Marks: 1 for brief, 2 for 2 large points.
    Tip: go for 1 mark most of the time.
e, evaluation:
Strategy: State why the target is good/bad,
    quote, give brief analysis, repeat once.
    Keywords: synonyms of "how well".
    Marks: 2-3
    Tip: agree with the question.
